Edges-Alchemist -- Male Human Veteran Alchemist
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d12
Skills (14 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Healing: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Alchemy: (sma) d10 Notice: (sma) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Athletics: (agi) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d6
Faith: (spi) d4 Science: (sma) d4
Skill Notes: Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Size: 0
Advances: 8 Improvement Points: 20 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 4; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (3 points): Arcane Background (Alchemist); Chemist; Discerning Hindrances: Can't Swim; Enemy; Phobia; Quirk Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Alchemist): Has Material Components+ feature
Enemy: Individual or remote group wants character eliminated
Phobia: Suffers -1 on Trait rolls in the presence of phobia subject
Quirk: Has a minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Combat
Parry: 5 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Kevlar Vest Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Derringer (2d4 R3"); Holy Water Pistol (None R1"); M-16 (2d8 R24" AP 2); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Can't Swim: Moves 1/3 Pace through water
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 15
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Alchemist): 3 Powers/15 Power Points
Arcane Background (Alchemist)-1: May make alchemical items/Concoctions given to others have specific aspects, use self Alchemy to activate, and must be used w/in 48 hr
Chemist: Concoctions given to others last 1 wk
Discerning: Increases concoction duration from 5 to 8
Material Components+: Suffers -4 arcane skill rolls when materials are unavailable; critical failure exhausts materials
